mapper.select: SELECT BNUM, USERID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BPICNAME, BDATE, BSUB FROM BOARDT WHERE BSUB=1 ORDER BY BNUM DESC
SELECT USERT.UNAME USERNAME, CONT.CNUM CNUM, CONT.BNUM BNUM, CONT.CCONTENT CCONTENT, CONT.CDATE CDATE FROM CONT INNER JOIN USERT ON CONT.USERID=USERT.USERID ORDER BY CONT.CNUM ASC
